product.title: Forum Runner
product.description: Adds push notification for your users using Forum Runner on the iPhone/iPod/iPad. Also takes care of notifying users that your forum supports Forum Runner if they are viewing from a supported device.

phrasetype.name: Scheduled Tasks
phrasetype.phrase: This runs every 10 minutes and queues up private message and thread subscription notifications to send to the Forum Runner server to be distributed to your users running Forum Runner. It sends no personal or identifying information. Additionally cleans up garbage in some database tables.

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: Forum Runner Settings
Enable Forum Runner Prompt?

Select Yes if you would like Forum Runner to send your users browsing through their mobile browsers on supported devices a one-time message notifying them about Forum Runner support, or No to disable this. If enabled and the user cancels the prompt, they will not be prompted again.
Exclude Forums From Forum Runner
Choose which forums you would like to exclude from being listed through Forum Runner to your mobile users. You can use Control-Click to select multiple forums.
Exclude No Forums
Enable Google AdSense or AdMob Integration?

Select Yes if you would like Forum Runner to embed Google AdSense or AdMob ads into threads on your user's mobile devices running the app. You will need to view http://www.forumrunner.com/forum/showthread.php?t=29 follow these instructions and fill in the following options to get this running.
Place Google or AdMob Ad In Thread List?
Select Yes if you would like Forum Runner to embed a Google AdSense or AdMob ad in the thread list (above the "Load More Threads" button)
Place Google or AdMob Ad At Top Of Thread?
Select Yes if you would like Forum Runner to embed a Google AdSense or AdMob ad at the top of the thread page (below the first post)
Place Google or AdMob Ad At Bottom Of Thread?
Select Yes if you would like Forum Runner to embed a Google AdSense or AdMob ad at the bottom of the thread page (above the therad summary))
Usergroups to send Google or AdMob Ads To
Comma separated list of Usergroup ID numbers to send Google AdSense or AdMob ads to. You can get the ID #s from the "Usergroup Manager"
Usergroups to EXCLUDE sending Google or AdMob Ads To

Comma separated list of Usergroup ID numbers to EXCLUDE from sending Google AdSense or AdMob ads to. You can get the ID #s from the "Usergroup Manager". This will override the include setting above (for example, if you want to exclude a secondary usergroup from AdSense/AdMob ads)
AdMob Publisher ID for iPhone
Enter the AdMob Publisher ID for iPhone that you have set up. See this post for full instructions on setting up AdMob)
AdMob Publisher ID for Android
Enter the AdMob Publisher ID for Android that you have set up. See this post for full instructions on setting up AdMob)
Google AdSense Mobile Javascript

Please note that if you are using AdMob, fill in the field above. This field is only for Google AdSense. Enter Google AdSense Mobile Javascript Code here. See this post for full instructions on setting up Google AdSense)
Background Color of Mobile App's Header
Choose a color for the background of the headers when your users browse into your app. Leave empty (or transparent) for the default color. This *MUST* be in the format "#rrggbb" OR "rgb(r, g, b)".
Allow Forum Runner Signatures?
Allow "Posted from my <device> using Forum Runner" to be appended to posts from your users who post from Forum Runner?
Google Analytics Account ID
Enter the Google Analytics Account ID you wish to use for tracking analytic data. See this post on how to set up Google Analytics for Forum Runner. Leave blank if you do not wish to use this feature.
Allow In-App Registration?

Enable this setting if you wish to allow in-app registration from your mobile devices. If disabled, when a user taps the "Register" button, they will simply be forwarded to your existing registration page.
